     368             :   /* UpdateSingleSource - Centralized abstract function to implement in those
     369             :    * cases where a single device is being shared between users. Should apply net

     388             :   /* ReevaluateAllocation - Call to change constraints for an allocation of
     389             :    * a single device. Manages allocation handles, calculates net constraints
